search_engine.indexer

Class PostTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.PostTuple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<PostTuple>

     class PostTuple
extends Object
implements Comparable<PostTuple>
    This class provides an implementation of a tuple in which tf is term frequency: number of appearance of a particular vocabulary in the document with stored docId
    Author:
    ngtrhieu0011

      • PostTuple

        protected PostTuple(String tupleString)
        Protected Constructor
        This is called by the Posting to attempt read and construct postings from file
        Note that the tupleString must have the format: 
         df,tf
        where df and tf are parse-able integer numbers in string format. Fail is assumption and the program will crash
        Parameters:
        tupleString - the raw String from the file
